name: Tweet Tweet Dozer
description:
For when the bureaucracy gets to be too much, it's Killdozer time. A two tweet collaboration between Rhiz and StramDozer for #TweetTweetJam

Controls:

Left/right rotate

Z is forward

P.S. The Killdozer is a sad and scary story that is often softened and misrepresented. We made this game while watching Donoteat's YouTube video on Killdozer.
